query:
SELECT
            genres.id,
            genres.remote_id,
            genres.code,
            genres.description,
            genres.meta,
            (
                SELECT
                    JSON_BUILD_OBJECT(
                        'id', sources.id,
                        'name', sources.name
                    )
                FROM sources
                WHERE sources.id = genres.source
            ) AS "source!: Source"
        FROM genres
        WHERE (meta = $1 OR $1 IS NULL)
        ORDER BY genres.id ASC
        LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3
